decks.notes: This Orzhov Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and disruption spells. By combining low-cost creatures like Sunpearl Kirin and Nurturing Pixie with removal spells like Seam Rip and Get Lost, the deck aims to maintain board control and pressure the opponent early on. Cards like Momentum Breaker and Overlord of the Balemurk help push through damage, while Cosmogrand Zenith provides a powerful finisher. With a mix of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells, this deck aims to close out the game quickly and efficiently.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent using aggressive creatures and efficient burn spells. With a low mana curve and high creature count, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent early in the game. Key cards include Emberheart Challenger for direct damage, Nova Hellkite for board control, and Burnout Bashtronaut for a strong finisher. Utilizing the combination of creatures and burn spells, this deck is built to efficiently deal damage and secure victories in a fast-paced 1 vs 1 format.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly establish a board presence with aggressive creatures and use cards like Jackal, Genius Geneticist and Keen-Eyed Curator to generate card advantage and maintain pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of Gene Pollinator and Ouroboroid allows for potential combo plays and snowballing advantages. Multiversal Passage helps fix mana while providing additional creature tokens. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures and synergistic abilities to quickly close out the game.

The main focus of this UR Aggro deck is to aggressively attack the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures like Quantum Riddler, Riverpyre Verge, and Marauding Mako. Utilizing cards like Vivi Ornitier and Profit's Eidetic Memory for card advantage and tempo, the deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent. With removal spells like Torch the Tower and Abrade, as well as disruption from Multiversal Passage and Winternight Stories, this deck can quickly overwhelm opponents while maintaining board control.

This deck focuses on controlling the opponent's actions through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card draw. By disrupting the opponent's game plan and building card advantage, the deck aims to outlast the opponent and eventually win through incremental advantage. The mana base is designed to support the deck's three-color requirements while also providing the necessary consistency and flexibility to handle a variety of matchups. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to maintain control of the game and grind out a victory through resource management and strategic play.

The main concept of this deck is to put pressure on the opponent through a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. With cards like Spyglass Siren and Floodpits Drowner, you can control the board while dealing damage to your opponent. Multiversal Passage and Restless Reef help you fix your mana base for consistent plays. Enduring Curiosity helps you draw cards to maintain your momentum. Overall, this Dimir Aggro deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly and efficiently, utilizing a mix of creatures, spells, and card advantage to secure victory.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and spells in order to deal damage and win the game before the opponent can stabilize. The deck includes a mix of cheap creatures with evasion, burn spells for removal and direct damage, and card draw to maintain momentum. The key strategy is to maintain pressure on the opponent while efficiently using resources to ensure a swift victory.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent quickly with aggressive creatures and spells, focusing on dealing damage efficiently and taking control of the game early on. The deck includes a mix of creatures with high power levels and spells that can deal direct damage or control the board. By utilizing cards like Torch the Tower and Into the Flood Maw, along with efficient creatures like Steamcore Scholar and Marauding Mako, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent and close out the game before they have a chance to stabilize.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures and then bring them back to the battlefield using reanimation spells. By utilizing cards like Ardyn, the Usurper and Bringer of the Last Gift, the deck can overwhelm opponents with formidable creatures like Superior Spider-Man and Overlord of the Balemurk. The combination of reanimation spells like Bitter Triumph and Awaken the Honored Dead with powerful creatures creates a strong synergy that allows for explosive turns and strategic plays to dominate the game.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively control the board with a combination of cheap spells and efficient creatures. The deck aims to apply pressure early with cards like Marauding Mako and Fear of Missing Out, while also disrupting the opponent with cards like Abrade and Torch the Tower. By utilizing a mix of direct damage, card draw, and tempo plays, the deck aims to maintain a consistent aggressive stance throughout the game and close out the match quickly before the opponent can stabilize.

This deck focuses on quickly developing a board presence and overwhelming the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures and disruptive spells. By utilizing mana acceleration from cards like Llanowar Elves and Multiversal Passage, the deck can quickly deploy threats like Floodpits Drowner, Gene Pollinator, and Ouroboroid. Additionally, the inclusion of Spyglass Siren and Tishana's Tidebinder allows for disruption of the opponent's strategy, while cards like Keen-Eyed Curator and Azure Beastbinder ensure a consistent flow of threats. The deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain it throughout the game to secure a swift victory.

This deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures with evasion to quickly deal damage to the opponent. By utilizing a mix of flying and unblockable creatures, along with removal spells and counterspells, it aims to control the board while chipping away at the opponent's life total. The deck also incorporates a small amount of card draw and graveyard recursion to maintain card advantage and ensure a steady stream of threats.Overall, the key strategy is to apply early pressure and maintain control of the game until victory is secured.

The focus of this Dimir Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. Cards like Floodpits Drowner and Gloomlake Verge provide early pressure, while cards like Preacher of the Schism and Phantom Interference disrupt the opponent's game plan. Cecil, Dark Knight and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares offer additional threats and synergy with the deck's strategy. The deck also includes removal spells like Stab and Shoot the Sheriff to deal with opposing threats. The mana base is designed to support both aggressive plays and the deck's powerful late-game threats.

This deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with efficient creatures and ramping mana generation. By utilizing cards like Llanowar Elves and Gene Pollinator, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a steady stream of threats. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Spyglass Siren and Tishana's Tidebinder provide disruption and control elements to the aggressive strategy. The deck also includes support cards like Multiversal Passage and Soulstone Sanctuary to ensure consistent mana production and protection for key creatures. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain it throughout the game.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures while disrupting their strategies with control elements. By playing strong creatures like Cecil, Dark Knight and Spyglass Siren, as well as utilizing cards like Bitter Triumph and Tragic Trajectory to remove threats, the deck aims to maintain board presence and control the game. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Phantom Interference and Multiversal Passage allows for some tactical plays to outmaneuver the opponent. Ultimately, the goal is to quickly build a dominant position on the battlefield and secure victory.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent by playing aggressive creatures and burn spells to deal damage as quickly as possible. With a low mana curve and a focus on direct damage spells, the goal is to maintain pressure on the opponent and end the game before they have a chance to stabilize. The inclusion of powerful creatures like Nova Hellkite and Razorkin Needlehead provide additional threats that can quickly close out the game if left unchecked. The deck aims to be fast, efficient, and relentless in its pursuit of victory.
